title: Chemical inhibition of cell surface modification sensitizes bacteria to phage infection
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00070F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marian Aba Addo, Zhiyu Zang, Joseph P. Gerdt
Chemical inhibitor of cell wall alanylation sensitizes bacteria to diverse bacteriophages, revealing the widespread immunity conferred by cell wall modification.
